project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a user-specified CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for the numerical columns selected by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to load CSV file
Implement method to calculate mean for selected numerical columns
Implement method to calculate median for selected numerical columns
Implement method to calculate mode for selected numerical columns
Implement user interface to select numerical columns for analysis
Write tests for each of the implemented functions
Execute tests on the functions to ensure correctness
